Name: 0.8 Ground overlay charts
Description: Ground overlay charts displaying on the Google Map.

Name: 0.7 First test release
Description:
This is the 1st version made public. Please use the download *once* for the statistics, and then bookmark the page. You need to have a modern browser with JavaScript enabled. In order to see the console Pop-up must be enabled. See the users manual on how to report bugs.

The "Download" contains a HTML page, just open the link in there.

Name: 0.9.0xx (FsxWs, multi icon, PHP proxy)
Description:
New features over 0.8

1:
Approach towards real time updates ("moving map") by directly connecting to FSX via FsxWs. Shows navaids if FMC files are installed.

Test phase - please be patient if something does not work yet.
FsxWs: http://fsxws.codeplex.com/

2:
Started with different icons for different planes. Would appreciate if someone can draw better icons.

3:
Improved PHP proxy
